posts.postText:
Not really sure where this should go, but this seems close?
Can I ban someone from flood for AFKing overnight and accumulating $150,000 floodcash by doing so?
Just kick them if they are afk, a ban seems harsh since we don't have it saying "Do not go afk" or any afk rule on the server.

>> 
Just kick them if they are afk, a ban seems harsh since we don't have it saying "Do not go afk" or any afk rule on the server.
 

I agree with you on the kick, but please add some sort of AFK kicker so it doesnt become unfair.
